Images.Caption: Start a recording with the press of a button.
Choose from a list of all your recordings.
Play back, trim, rename and delete your recording.

LocalizedProperties.ProductDescription: Record sounds, lectures, interviews, and other events. Mark key moments as you record, edit, or play them back.

Properties.PublisherCertificateName: CN=Microsoft Corporation, O=Microsoft Corporation, L=Redmond, S=Washington, C=US

Features: Start a recording or resume a paused recording in one click
Recordings are autosaved and stored in your Documents folder for easy access
Easily share your recordings with friends and family, or send recordings to other apps
Play back, trim, rename, and delete your recordings
Mark key moments in the recording
A universal app, for PC, tablet, and Windows Phone
LocalizedProperties.ReleaseNotes: Thank you for using Voice Recorder! All of our regular updates include bug fixes and performance improvements to make Voice Recorder better for you.
LocalizedProperties.SkuDescription: Record sounds, lectures, interviews, and other events. Mark key moments as you record, edit, or play them back.
